N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 6-3.7 - Injury and illness incident reporting

State Regulations
A full report of any injury or illness incident occurring at a spray ground shall be reported by the owner/operator to the permit-issuing official within 24 hours of its occurrence, and a notation recorded in a log book. This shall include all incidents occurring at a spray ground facility which: (a) result in death; (b) require resuscitation; (c) require referral to a hospital or other facility for medical attention; or
(d) is an illness alleged to be associated with the spray ground water quality. Notes
